title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion euros, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Spending in billion euros has increased over the Year
Spending in billion euros is gradually constant from 2012 to 2018, and lastly gradually increasing from 2018 to 2028.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2028.
Max Spending in billion euros about 26.4 was recorded at Year 2028
Min Spending in billion euros about 12.2 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion euros with a total of 8 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2028 to 2012.
